title: Product Manager, Google TV Smart Home Experiences
description: At Google, we put our users first. The world is always changing, so we need Product Managers who are continuously adapting and excited to work on products that affect millions of people every day. In this role, you will work cross-functionally to guide products from conception to launch by connecting the technical and business worlds. You can break down complex problems into steps that drive product development. Our team works closely with engineers, designers, marketers, etc. to design and develop technologies that improve access to information.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience. 5 years of experience in product management. 2 years of experience developing or launching products within software as a service (SaaS) or a related area. Experience in the development of consumer-facing software products.
preferred_qualifications: 8 years of experience in product management. Understanding of user experience design and technical fundamentals. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
responsibilities: Lead the product roadmap for Smart Home experiences on TV, leveraging open standards like Matter and technologies like GenAI. Work closely with TV OEMs, retailers, and other Smart Home ecosystem partners to build products and drive TV scale and distribution. Drive leadership reviews and build alignment at the executive level for the roadmap. Collaborate effectively with Devices and Services, and build cross-team, cross-product area alignment while crafting experiences that make the most sense on a TV.
